body:
This represents the official release of Apicurio Studio, version 0.1.6.

The following issues have been resolved in this release:

* [#150](https://api.github.com/repos/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/150) API Studio: Recent APIs stick around even if they no longer exist on the server
* [#147](https://api.github.com/repos/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/147) Front End: Better handling of "cannot connect to server" errors
* [#145](https://api.github.com/repos/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/145) API Editor: securityDefinitions BASIC output violates spec
* [#143](https://api.github.com/repos/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/143) API Editor: Invalid syntax produced for array containing reference
* [#141](https://api.github.com/repos/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/141) Api Editor: Add ability to duplicate elements (definition, paths, etc)
* [#138](https://api.github.com/repos/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/138) API Editor: Version field is not obvious in /info
* [#136](https://api.github.com/repos/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/136) API Editor: Clicking "As JSON" in causes unsaved editing to be lost. 
* [#135](https://api.github.com/repos/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/135) Hub API: add postgresql support
* [#134](https://api.github.com/repos/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/134) Hub API: add mysql storage support
* [#133](https://api.github.com/repos/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/133) API Studio: enable prodmode for angular
* [#132](https://api.github.com/repos/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/132) API Studio: Better handling of errors
* [#129](https://api.github.com/repos/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/129) Upgrade from angular 2 to angular 4
* [#128](https://api.github.com/repos/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/128) Cant create new API: Path mandatory?
* [#126](https://api.github.com/repos/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/126) Some basic back-end API skeleton code
* [#121](https://api.github.com/repos/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/121) Back-End: Implement back-end API in Java (jax-rs)
* [#120](https://api.github.com/repos/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/120) Authentication: Implement proper GitHub OAuth web flow authentication
* [#115](https://api.github.com/repos/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/115) Back-End: Design the studio API


For more information, please see the Apicurio Studio's official project site:

* [General Information](http://www.apicur.io/)
* [Download/Quickstart](http://www.apicur.io/download)
* [Blog](http://www.apicur.io/blog)
name: Beta 7
